name: Luna Park
overview: The Luna Park is a six player pusher from VdW boasting fairground atmosphere with balloons, rollercoaster and Merry Go Rounds. This machine has an entire new design and includes attractive and modern features. Luna Park is the ultimate Token game that has been built from scratch with 20 years of experience. As with all VdW pushers, the game has play appeal, user and player friendliness and reliability.
